trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.

The child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , , , or value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, .

Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> is read-only

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> is not enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Sets the keyboard focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> did not get focus.

Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> to the specified value.
The value to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*> property to.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> is not enabled.
value is .

Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>
